channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Driving a Stake Through Stakeholder Capitalism
item.description: A review of Andy Puzder’s new book, A Tyranny for the Good of Its Victims .

item.description: Scott Boatwright didn’t rule out that prices could rise if costs become a “significant headwind.”

item.title: Crypto stocks rise after Trump names currencies in strategic reserve
